com.davidmiguel.gobees.hive

Class HiveRecordingsFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.davidmiguel.gobees.hive.HiveRecordingsFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, HiveContract.HiveRecordingsView, RecordingsAdapter.RecordingItemListener, BaseTabFragment, BaseView<HiveContract.Presenter>

    public class HiveRecordingsFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
implements BaseTabFragment, HiveContract.HiveRecordingsView, RecordingsAdapter.RecordingItemListener
    Dispaly a list of recordings.
